outline:
1. to cease, cause to cease, cut off, destroy, perish
    1. (Qal)
      1. to cease
      2. to cause to cease, destroy
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be cut off
      2. to be undone, be cut off at sight of the theophany
kjv_def: cease, be cut down (off), destroy, be brought to silence, be undone, [idiom] utterly.
strongs_def: to be dumb or silent; hence, to fail or perish; trans. to destroy
